reviews.review: If the devs actually gave a fuck about their game they'd actually bother to fix the stuff wrong with it like the hit boxes and the blatant hacking still going on. Instead they waste their time on useless graphical updates which really don't improve anything in the slightest and then add breakable walls to all of the older maps they choose to "improve" because they're simply just lazy as hell and only care about raking in a ton of cash while alienating their players. If they really cared about their game, they'd rehire a playtesting team instead of firing them like they did a long while ago. I highly recommend against this game because it's an utter waste of your time and money. Play something else that actually has depth to it, which describes any other game besides this one.
un juego muy divertido tanto al estar matando como killer o al escapar como suvivor
es un buen juego tiene buen contenido y es adictivo la verdad estoy muy sastisfecho
Although is buggy as s***, it is a lot of fun! Really addictive!
SO BAD ... I MEAN VERY GOOOD GAME.
Killer is fun.Survivor can be boring but with friends its 10x better
El mejor online que he jugado en mi vida, lastima el nivel de toxicidad que hay pero respecto al tema de personajes y habilidades es espectacular
very good game but the hit boxes are bad tho

O jogo e um misto ele e muito bom  e divertido pelos primeiros ranks, por√©m quando vc chega em ranks mais altos come√ßa a ficar estressante e repetitivo(pelo lado do killer), os killers em sua maioria s√£o muito divertidos de se jogar e tamb√©m tem espa√ßo para aperfei√ßoamento e criatividade no uso das habilidades (the blight e um dos killers mais divertidos), os sobreviventes, no come√ßo tem um loop de gameplay bem entediante e simples, mas com o tempo assim como os killers vc consegue usar sua criatividade e conhecimento de jogo para enrolar o killer enquanto os outros fazem os objetivos, bem no finalizando as mecanicas e loop de gameplay do DbD s√£o muito boas,por√©m ele pode acabar te estressando muito facil seja voce killer ou surv, uma dica se vc querer muito esse jogo eu recomendo vc jogar para se divertir n fique presso em so vencer se divirta um pouco (enquanto pode kk), sim existem bugs, mas raramente eles estragam a gameplay.

Well if it was 2015-2021 I wouldn't recommend it cuz lots of bug in the game balance between killers and survivors etc but now things has been changed devs "sometimes" listen to the community which is pretty great for everyone to improve the game and our community.

It good but I don't see how it can be competitive. Yeah it gets your adrenaline rushing when you are getting chased, but for me that's because of the atmosphere and sounds. Honestly I have more fun when I just jump into a game with some friends and just vibe. Also playing the killer is not as good as playing the people, unless it's in a private match imo. Buy when on sale, it happens a good ammount.
i love this game its really good

Being a survivor is great.  It's extremely fun, but can be SUPER frustrating when you get annoying teammates (you know the ones) :) 
Being a killer is pretty awesome, too, so you can't go wrong.

Dead by Day ist ein Mehrspieler Survival-Horror Spiel wo ihr 4vs1 spielt. In dem Fall 4 √úberlebende und 1 Killer. Ich habe nun schon ein Stunden damit verbracht und habe den Multiplayer Modus sowohl als √úberlebende mit freunden als auch als Killer gespielt, auch Customs habe ich mit freunden gespielt. Es ist nicht unbedingt Anf√§nger freundlich aber man findet sich schnell rein. Ab und gibt es in dem Game auch "bl√∂de Killer" mit denen ihr rechnen m√ºsst, zum beispiel Killer die euch "Campen" wenn ihr am haken kommt oder welche die euch "tunneln", also euch chasen nachdem ihr befreit wurdet. DIese Momente machen das spiel ungenie√übar. Das spiele biete euch viele Inhalte wie perks und gegenst√§nde wie Bsp Taschenlampe die das spiel sehr beeinflussen k√∂nnen, abgesehen von eueren outplay skills. Au√üerdem kommen in dem Spiele oft neue Inhalte dazu sprich DLC¬¥s dazu kommen neue killer, √ºberlebende und perks, die ihr mit echtgeld oder ingame w√§hrung kaufen k√∂nnt. Mir gef√§llt das spiel sehr und w√ºrdest es auch weiterempfehlen.

An addicting game that requires adapting to new strategies and learning through lots of trial and errors. It is a game where the learned tricks become very satisfying and delivers gameplay that are mostly differentiating from game to game. Although there are some toxicity with some players, most of my experiences of the community are friendly people just looking for a fun game. Great to see revivals of classic horror and branch out the horror genre in a fun way.

SAKIN! Oyun hem terkedilmi≈ü hem de bok gibi. DBD'yi (dead by daylight) 7000-8000 saat oynayan insanlar var. 1000 k√ºs√ºr saat oynayanlar s√ºr√ºyle zaten. Bilmem bu size bir fikir verir mi? ;)

M√ºmk√ºnse 4 ki≈üi, m√ºmk√ºn deƒüilse 2-3 arkada≈ü aynƒ± anda alƒ±n, aynƒ± anda korkun, aynƒ± anda ke≈üfedin, aynƒ± anda √∂ƒürenin. ƒ∞lla 4 ki≈üi oynamak zorunda deƒüilsiniz.
